name: Glass House Politics
short_description:
Glass House Politics is a social network focused on politics. It enables politicians and citizens to effectively discuss political affairs, and it dramatically changes the way politicians function in their role as a representative of the public.

It will enable anyone to pickup the role filled by politicians today, as the political decision making process will be made by the public, and then simple put in effect by the actual elected representative.

By developing the system open source, we hope to encourage everyone to download the source code, and help us improve the system and make it as secure and transparent as possible.

This project is in planning stage, please visit our website to get more information on the idea and philosophy behind Glass House Politics.
summary: Glass House Politics is a social network focused on politics.
